Events.Text: Not again! You took the wrong bus and got totally lost in the middle of the city. But you have to get to your friend's wedding in time! Ask you personal AI assistant for help. [instruction 1 of 5]
I need to get to my friends wedding and I took the wrong bus. I need directions please.
The friend's wedding is somewhere near Broadway and Main. If you can get there, you should know your way again. [instruction 2 of 5]
are you on foot?
Do you want to drive, walk, or use public transit?
I will walk, I need to get to Broadway and Main.

Follow the way-instructions of the assistant and imagine you do what it says. But your sense of orientation is pretty bad and you cannot deal with instructions involving 'North', 'West', 'South', 'East'. So if that comes up, ask for more details. [instruction 3 of 5]
from where?
Where are you departing from?
I am in the middle of the city.
which city?
what is the name of the city?
I am not sure :/ maybe you have some choices?
Maybe Newyork or chicago?
Maybe Newyork or chicago?
Let's go with Chicago I guess.
Complain about the general situation, make a joke, or say something about the environment you imagine yourself in right now. [instruction 4 of 5]
which mode of transport?
Do you want to drive, walk, or use public transit?
I will walk. The traffic is way to bad to drive!

DetailedWalkingInstructions: Walk 2 blocks east on Forbes Avenue towards Murray. You will pass a fire station on your left.
Turn right and walk for 3 blocks until you arrive at the tall brown church. Cross the street after arriving at the church.
Turn left and walk for 5 minutes. You will pass a school on your right. Keep going until you see the park on your left.
Your destination will be on the right besides the Starbucks.

Turn right and walk for 3 blocks until you arrive at the church
Turn left and walk for 5 minutes until you see the park on your left.
Your destination will be on the right

Events.Text: Thank you and goodbye.

Scenario.UserTask: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk System bot (darker yellow boxes in the dialogue). Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk System bot (not the assistant) has told you to do so.
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Some facts you should be aware of: 

* At the beginning of the conversation, the user's location is University
* At the beginning of the conversation it is 1pm

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
